menu.playerList.title: Player List
menu.graveyard.title: Graveyard
role.jailor.name: Jailor
role.jailor.abilities: *Choose one player to jail during the day*You can execute your prisoners up to three times
role.jailor.attributes: *You may anonymously talk with your prisoner at night*If you execute a town member, you forfiet the ability to jail prisoners*Jailed players are immune to all attacks, frames, transports, douses and more*Jailed players can't use their ability
role.sheriff.name: Sheriff
role.sheriff.abilities: *Interrogate a player to find out if they're innocent or suspicious
role.sheriff.attributes: *Frames, Douses, Hexes, and Enchants can make your target look suspicious wrongly
role.lookout.name: Lookout
role.lookout.abilities: *Watch a player to find everyone who visited them
role.lookout.attributes: *You can not see astral visits*You can never see yourself visit
role.doctor.name: Doctor
role.doctor.abilities: *Target a player to save them from death*Target yourself one time to save yourself
role.doctor.attributes: *You give your target powerfull defense*You and your target will know if they were attacked and saved
role.bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
role.bodyguard.abilities: *Target a player to guard them, killing their attacker, but getting attacked yourself*Target yourself one time to protect yourself
role.bodyguard.attributes: *When you guard yourself, you gain powerfull defense*You and your target will know if they were attacked and protected*You will redirect attacks from your target onto yourself, and you will attack those players back
role.escort.name: Escort
role.escort.attributes: *Roleblocking a player prevents them from using parts of their ability
role.medium.name: Medium
role.medium.abilities: *You can talk with the dead during the night
role.medium.attributes: *You can talk to other mediums during the night as well
role.retributionist.name: Retributionist
role.retributionist.abilities: *Force a dead player to use their ability on a living one
role.retributionist.attributes: *Your ability only works on townies who can only target one player*You cant use the same person two times
role.vigilante.name: Vigilante
role.vigilante.attributes: *You have three bullets*You can't shoot night 1*If you shoot a town member, you will commit suicide the next night*Your suicide deals an unstoppable attack towards yourself*You have a basic attack
role.veteran.name: Veteran
role.veteran.abilities: *Target yourself to alert, killing everyone who visits you
role.veteran.attributes: *You will know if you attack someone*You have a powerfull attack*You have basic defense while on alert
role.mafioso.name: Mafioso
role.mafioso.attributes: *A Godfather can force you to target someone else*You have a basic attack*If the mafia has no Mafioso, a memeber of the mafia will become the Mafioso at the start of night
role.consort.name: Consort
role.consort.attributes: *Roleblocking a player prevents them from using parts of their ability
role.blackmailer.name: Blackmailer
role.blackmailer.abilities: *Blackmail a player to silence them for the next day
role.blackmailer.attributes: *Silenced players can not talk or vote
role.janitor.name: Janitor
role.janitor.abilities: *Clean a player on the night they die
role.janitor.attributes: *Cleaning a player erases information from their grave*You will know the role and will of a player you clean, but it wont show up in the graveyard
role.framer.name: Framer
role.framer.abilities: *Target two players to frame the first one
role.framer.attributes: *You can only pick non mafia memebers for your first target, but anyone as your second target*Your second visit is astral*Lookouts and trackers will see that your first target visited your second target*Psychics will see framed players as evil*Seers will see framed players as mafia*Sheriffs will see framed players as suspicious
role.covenLeader.name: Coven Leader
role.voodooMaster.name: Voodoo Master
role.jester.name: Jester
role.jester.abilities: *Get lynched to win*After you are lynched, you can haunt a player who didn't vote innocent
role.jester.attributes: *If you haunt nobody, you will haunt a random player*Haunting is an unstoppable astral attack
chatmessage.playerDied: \0 (\1) died and was killed by \2. Their will stated: \3

chatmessage.trialVerdict: \0 was voted \1 with \2 innocent votes and \3 guilty votes.
chatmessage.mayorCantWhisper: You can't whisper as or to a revealed mayor.
chatmessage.jailorDecideExecuteYou: The Jailor decided to execute you!
chatmessage.mediumSeanceYou: You're being seanced by the medium!
chatmessage.jesterWon: The jester will get their revenge from the grave!
chatmessage.executionerWon: The executioner got their target lynched!
chatmessage.night.roleBlocked.immune: Someone tried to roleblock you but you are immune.
chatmessage.night.targetSurvivedAttack: Your target had defense and survived the attack.
chatmessage.night.youSurvivedAttack: You were attacked but had defense and survived.
chatmessage.night.targetJailed: Your ability failed because your target was jailed!
chatmessage.night.veteranAttackedYou: You were attacked by the veteran you visited.
chatmessage.night.vigilanteSuicide: You committed suicide over the guilt of killing an innocnet person.
chatmessage.night.doctorHealed: You healed your target while they got attacked.
chatmessage.night.doctorHealedYou: A doctor healed you while you got attacked.
chatmessage.night.silenced: You were silenced! You can not speak or communicate in any way until at least the start of the next day!
chatmessage.night.playersRoleAndWill: Your targets role was \0 and their will stated this: \1
chatmessage.night.sheriffResult.suspicio: Your target seems to be suspicious.
chatmessage.night.sheriffResult.innocent: Your target seems to be innocent.
